name: Active
description: The client is an active client.

name: Suspended
description: The client's account is currently suspended.  A client's account can be suspended due to missing payments or any negative activing issue.

name: Deactivated
description: The client's account has been deactivated.  Deactivated accounts are set to archive after a period of time.

name: Archive
description: The client is no longer active and their account has been deactivated and set to archive.
